settings.text: Have a question? Need some help? Want to know more about a product, returns, shipping options, or just fancy a chat? Weâ€™re always happy to help, so give us a call, tweet us, or drop us an email.

settings.title: Contact us
settings.text: We're based in the UK, so work on GMT. If we're not around, we'll try and get back to you ASAP the next working day.
